item.title: From Backend to Blackboard: Bringing Engineering Logic to the Classroom
item.description:
The New Chapter: My Transition Story

[English] After years of deep diving into C++ and Python server-side logic and navigating through personal health challenges that tested my resilience, I’ve found a new mission. My journey from a software engineer at a 211 university to a coding educator isn’t just a career change—it’s a commitment to passing on the torch of logic and creativity. I’m here to bridge the gap between rigorous industrial development and the boundless curiosity of young minds.
